system.description: People of the sea, they are never very comfortable far from a large body of water. Corsairs are wanderers and like to be on the move. Corsairs tend to be humble in that they understand that nature is greater than they are and respect it for that. If you are an Corsair, crave water and sailing, go with the flow, keep on the move, and keep things ship shape.

overview.base: All thrown weapons are AV0 for you.
overview.proficient: The range of all thrown weapons you use is doubled.
overview.fluent: Instead, the range of all thrown weapons you use is tripled.

overview.base:
Wind Shuriken counts as a weapon in the dagger weapon class.
Note: Although Wind Shuriken does not deal magic damage, it can be made to using Might Strike.
Design Note: Should we rewrite this so that Wind Shuriken isn't something that people can Avoid or easily Resist?
overview.proficient: Instead, deal [[/roll 1d10]] damage to target.
overview.fluent: Instead, deal [[/roll 1d12]] damage to target.

results.hit: Deal [[/roll 1d8]] damage to target.
Target takes a body hack.
results.critHit: If you want, target takes standard damage as well.

overview.base: You swim at full speed.
Target gains one standard ability you have, aren't incapable of, and are proficient in. You may only have this active on one creature at a time.

system.endCondition: You use Skill Share again.
